sentence: We had to scramble a bit to get the room prepared prior to the meeting at 9AM
There was no microwave in room and no breakfast available which was an inconvenience
The front desk staff figured out the issue but seemed aggravated when they told me I could have two rooms and I insisted that I needed the 4 rooms which I had reserved and confirmed
The rooms look great but the bathroom is subpar
We had planned to get breakfast at the hotel because our conference started early each morning but this just put us off doing anything there except sleep in the room
Excuse me you have the wrong room
My main issues revolve around cleanliness HVAC air quality room product including carpets wall coverings furnishings and fixtures
The rooms are small as well as the bathroom
If you do not care that you will not find your items left in the room book this facility
The water in the shower did not get hot
The room was spacious and the location was great The bar restaurant in the lobby was a added bonus
Room was modern clean and had comfortable beds
The rooms are large with great lighting ample outlets for devices and new Bekman toiletries
Amazing rooms and great rates
Went down and bought breakfast two minutes later room service delivered
The hotel my room and the event went well
Because I m a housekeeper myself and I always clean the rooms before leaving
Location was perfect and it is nestled in greenery so it is a beautiful view from your window

Great Cs Service the front desk rep Bionca I Think her name was so helpful All the staff greeted us and made sure our short stay was comfortable very nice place clean room and plus the mall is close to it I give this Hotel 10 stars I Definitely Recommend this they also had great prices for booking we will be back soon 11619
Nice rooms and very upscale lobby
